overview.summary: Select a subset of a field.

description.p: This module clips out a subset of a field. The new field contains just the selected portion of the input field. The module runs in two modes. If the "clip field" is connected, it will clip the input field such that only those elements inside of the clip field are preserved. If no clip field is connected, the GUI widget is used to select which portion of the input field to preserve.

The type of the field is preserved in the clip, as well as the data values if possible. Some field types are structured and thus not clippable. This includes the LatticeVol, ImageField, and Scanline field types. There is an Unstructure module that can be used to convert these fields to appropriately unstructured versions before clipping.
